attributes.action: Keep 5 year ILR pathway for  migrants & students who are already in UK legally.
attributes.additional_details: Many international minds come to UK to learn and then apply great skills in UK Work sector for better opportunities. They have studied & worked on all odd and critical sectors like care, warehouse, food industry, science, technology, research and so on. We think changing ILR rules Mid-journey is unfare  & causing stress. Apply 10 year ILR rule to future entrances. also now government closed international care workers and in all visas Threshold are very high.so this people will backbone  economy.
attributes.background: Do not apply the proposed 10-year ILR rule to existing legal migrants  & international students in UK. who already contributing to UK economy.Keep the 5-year ILR route for those already in the UK on this visa. As government threshold are too high this will help in future economic contributions.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action:  https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727360
